 2015-02602015-02-26,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActPublic Servants Disclosure Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE PETER B. ANNIS of Ottawa, Ontario, a Judge of the Federal Court, to be a member of the Public Servants Disclosure Protection Tribunal to hold office for a term of four years, effective March 3, 2015.
